Description: As the costs of genome sequencing fall, more and more laboratories are exploring NGS. Laboratories are looking for highly reproducible NGS sample prep methods that limit potential for error. We will detail an automated process for the IDT xGen Library Prep Kits that offers the laboratory optional settings to optimize a demonstrated application that will process between 4 and 24 samples from start to finish with minimal interaction from the user.
Location: Spotlight Theater E - Sails Pavilion - Conv Ctr
SearchResultBody: ESP6E. Harnessing the Power of Automation:  IDT’s xGen™ kits on the Biomek NGeniuS Next Generation Library Prep System

Title: Harnessing the Power of Automation:  IDT’s xGen™ kits on the Biomek NGeniuS Next Generation Library Prep System
